Class UserServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
telrun.shortnik.service.UserServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetailsService, UserService
@Service public class UserServiceImpl extends Object implements UserService
A service for working with the User class.

      Returns:

      Throws:
      org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UsernameNotFoundException - if no user with the given username is found.
